about_the_game:
Robo Frenzy is a sandbox boss battling game where you craft weapons and construct machines while fighting giant robots inspired by everyday electronics.
Smash an enraged TV with a sword you made or capture a cranky computer by creatively building a trap. After you capture a robo, you can level it up and customize it to make your own sharable boss battle.

MAKE YOUR OWN BOSS


Capture boss robos, train them, and customize them with equipment to make your own sharable boss battle!

CRAFT WEAPONS


Before you can clobber a colossal typewriter, you'll need a weapon. Craft weapons by building factories and processing materials on the battlefield.

CONNECT FACTORIES


Link factories together to create dozens of weapons with different fighting styles. Toss a UFO to shoot a burst of bullets. Build a Chomp Charge to slam into enemies or use a D20 dice for an explosive finish. Robo Frenzy's multi-weapon, hack and slash combat system is easy to learn with tactical depth to master.

CONSTRUCT MACHINES


Build a cannon and use your crafted weapons as ammo or construct a springy bumper to repel a rampaging robot. Make dozens of physics powered machines and combine them with the weapons you create for infinite possibilities. You can even automate your fight by filling the battlefield with interconnected factories and machines!

BUILD YOUR TOWN

Use the power of crafting to customize Omniland, your very own buildable hub world. Solve puzzles by connecting machines and factories to unlock new weapons to use in battle.

CO-OP PLAY


Challenge grumpy game consoles alone or build a maze of machines with a buddy in two player co-op.

  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2400 @ 3.1 GHz or AMD FX-6300 @ 3.5 GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 550 Ti
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

  • Processor: Intel Core i7-4770 @ 3.4 GHz or AMD Ryzen 5 1600 @ 3.2 GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
